comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; de; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Firefox/3.6.13
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; de; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Firefox/3.6.13

I can not enter any text in the address bar or in the search bar. Only when Firefox is minimized and maximized again it works again. This happens one time a day on two different systems.

Reproducible: Sometimes

Steps to Reproduce:
don´t know
just try to type text into the fields
you can switch between the to fiels but you can not enter text.
Actual Results:  
It is neither an address nor a text displayed.

Expected Results:  
show the typed text

Add Ons: Down them all and Add Block. You have to minimize and maximize the browser to enter text again.
comments.author: alexander_kordes@web.de

comments.raw_text:
Alexander, this doesn't appear to be security sensitive.

Try disabling your extensions and see if that helps. Do you have any anti virus solutions installed like AVG?

http://support.mozilla.com/ may be able to help.
comments.author: bob@bclary.com
